text: Ligyra tantalus Ligyra punctipennis Ligyra is a genus of bee flies in the Bombyliidae family. It was described by Edward Newman in 1841. There are at least 110 described species in Ligyra. ==See also== * List of Ligyra species ==References== Category:Bombyliidae Category:Asiloidea genera Category:Taxa named by Edward Newman (entomologist)
title: Ligyra
